name: Boneshaker
aboutAuthor:
Cherie Priest is the author of two dozen books and novellas, most recently The Toll, The Family Plot,
  The Agony House, and the Philip K. Dick Award nominee Maplecroft; but she is perhaps best known for the steampunk pulp
  adventures of the Clockwork Century, beginning with Boneshaker. Her works have been nominated for the Hugo and Nebula awards
  for science fiction, and have won the Locus Award (among others) – and over the years, they’ve been translated into nine languages
in eleven countries. Cherie lives in Seattle, WA, with her husband and a menagerie of exceedingly photogenic pets.
